title: sap.fe.macros.FlexibleColumnLayoutActions
content:
# sap.fe.macros.FlexibleColumnLayoutActions

Building block for adding overflow toolbar buttons to integrate into the flexible column layout support from Fiori elements.
Usage example: 

<macros:FlexibleColumnLayoutActions />

**Type:** class **Module:** sap/fe/macros/fcl/FlexibleColumnLayoutActions.block
